text: RIO DE JANEIRO, July 12 The chairman and vice-chairman of Brazilian insurer BB Seguridade Participacoes SA have resigned, the company said in a Monday securities filing.The president and vice-president of the board will be replaced by the companys vice-president of business development and technology and vice-president of internal controls and risk management, respectively, the company said.BB Seguridade did not provide a motive for the resignations. (Reporting by Gram Slattery Editing by Chris Reese)
